---
title: "setproj"
---

    setproj!(type, proj)

Set a referencing system to the `type` object. This object can be a {{< gmtref GMTgrid type=gmttype >}}, a {{< gmtref GMTimage type=gmttype >}},
a {{< gmtref GMTdataset type=gmttype >}} or an `AbstractDataset`.

- `proj` Is either a Proj4 string or a WKT. Alternatively, it can also be another grid, image or dataset
         type, in which case its referencing system is copied into `type`
